title: B2B Horizon 5 - CRM-T Scale Down - Phase 1
description:
Description
General Business Epic (BE) Information
Business Epic Description
For non-SME+ customers from midmarket
who want to book new fixed-line contracts, manage existing contracts and have service requests,
the B2B touchpoints EOS and the O3 order service are to be adapted in such a way that communication with DOT no longer takes place via the LOM service in the direction of CRM-T, but via the Magenta API (M-APIs) in the new DOT world,
so that
the ability to deploy fixed-line products is maintained (by migrating to the target architecture DOT),
converged products (MF/FN) can be enabled in the future,
and the CRM-T legacy can be phased out.
In the first step, B2B can use it to provide fixed-line products (Business Start / Pro and Company Flex), and in a further step also mobile phone products (not this profile).

strategic_enablement.justification:
Acts as enabler for SME+ migration to DOT (MaxDOT epic)
Alignment according to target DOT architecture
Extensive use of existing PK/DOT capabilities
Enabling the retirement of the LOM
Fixed-mobile convergence

footnotes: Bezugszeitraum ist 12 Monate nach Launch für neue/zusätzliche Umsatzerlöse
Kosten für Risiken = Schadenshöhe x Eintrittswahrscheinlichkeit
